name: captivate
effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.platinum: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.
